page.title: 15LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content:
A cross section of the local residents gave their leisure time as below in order of popularity.
ADULTS CHILDREN & STUDENTS Gardening Reading Swimming Television Television Walking Tennis Football Knitting Badminton Cycling Reading Fishing Tennis Badminton Cricket Cooking Sewing Pop-music Cinema Squash Darts Computers Dancing Cricket Music Hockey Athletics Bingo Pub Roll-skating Squash Dressmaking Snooker Snooker Rugby Golf Horse-Riding Camping Rounders Birdwatch Driving Sledging Walking Photography Camping Fishing Basketball Swimming Football Shooting Speedway Jogging Decorating 5-a-side football Guitar Golf Disco Needlework Watching football
